sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Runs the Security Center Suites</description> <name>Run Security Center Suites</name> <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[var SCHEDULED_AUDITOR_SCAN = "789a691d51031110fa9bb36230460140"; var gr = new GlideRecord("sysauto_scan"); if (gr.get(SCHEDULED_AUDITOR_SCAN)) gs.executeNow(gr);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-11-08 00:48:09</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b72579d984031110fa9bae9b6f433d3e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Run Security Center Suites</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Security Center" source="sn_vsc">a51d46e3f2014110366b10017c5ba675</sys_package> <sys_policy>read</sys_policy> <sys_scope display_value="Security Center">a51d46e3f2014110366b10017c5ba675</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_b72579d984031110fa9bae9b6f433d3e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-11-08 23:37:01</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
